## AsyncCallOptions.messageChannel property

A class that can let you transfer messages between two sides

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
messageChannel: {
        on(event: string, callback: (data: unknown) => void): void;
        emit(event: string, data: unknown): void;
    };
```
